# Michael Volgin

> SWE at Enclave, shipping secure SaaS and sometimes words.

## About

Michael Volgin is a software engineer at Enclave (https://enclave.ai), focused on building secure SaaS products. He writes about engineering, security, and building products.

- X/Twitter: https://x.com/michag0d
- Email: mikivo807@gmail.com

- [Why I Write](https://michagod.com/blog/why-i-write) (2026-02-16): On shipping code all day and then opening a text editor anyway.
